name: SpaceEngine
content:
files:
- setup:
    filename: SE-0980-setup.exe
    referer: https://indiedb.com/
    url: https://www.indiedb.com/downloads/mirror/107943/115/1870a4993f8980d5583e0f8c870620ab/
- patch: http://daily-nerds.de/spaceengine/SpaceEngine/SE-0980e-patch.zip
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/SpaceEngine/system/SpaceEngine.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /SILENT /NOCANCEL
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/SpaceEngine
    src: patch
wine:
  version: tkg-4.5-x86_64
